Posts.EditableText: Is there a variable that stores all the actions?
Posts.HTML: Is there a variable that stores all the actions?

Posts.EditableText:
Do you mean a way of seeing all the actions defined on an object? Not as far as I can remember - but what would you need one for?

You can see if an object has a [i:1snxz23w]particular[/i:1snxz23w] action defined - it's there in the Condition Editor for "if": "An object (or room) has an action defined".
Posts.HTML:
Do you mean a way of seeing all the actions defined on an object? Not as far as I can remember - but what would you need one for?

You can see if an object has a particular action defined - it's there in the Condition Editor for "if": "An object (or room) has an action defined".
